> 8208


Actually I used `RsaCtfTool`. This tool was really great!


Let's dump n and e!

```bash
./RsaCtfTool.py --dumpkey --key ../public.pem 
private argument is not set, the private key will not be displayed, even if recovered.
n: 
e: 65537
```

Now let's decode 8208.txt!

```bash
python3 RsaCtfTool.py -n  -e 65537 --uncipher 
```

# Flag
